ARABIC: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًا شَٰهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We have sent you a Messenger to bear witness against you just as We sent Pharaoh a Messenger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have sent an Apostle to you as a witness against you, as We had sent an apostle to the Pharaoh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely We have sent to you a Messenger as a witness over you, just as We had sent a Messenger to Pharaoh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have sent you a Messenger, who will witness your deeds, just as We sent a Messenger to the Pharaoh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We have indeed sent a Noble Messenger towards you, a present witness over you – the way We had sent a Noble Messenger towards Firaun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, We have sent to you a Messenger to be a witness over you, as We did send a Messenger to Fir`awn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We have sent to you an Apostle, a witness against you, as We sent an apostle to Firon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely We have sent unto you a Messenger as a witness over you, even as We sent to Pharaoh a Messenger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! We have sent unto you a messenger as witness against you, even as We sent unto Pharaoh a messenger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have sent a messenger who is a witness over you, just as We sent a messenger to Pharoah before you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! We have sent Unto you an apostle, a witness over you, even as We sent Unto Fir'awn an apostle.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed We have sent to you an apostle, to be a witness to you, just as We sent an apostle to Pharaoh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We have sent to you, (O men!) a messenger, to be a witness concerning you, even as We sent a messenger to Pharaoh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, We have sent to you (O men) a Messenger (Muhammad SAW) to be a witness over you, as We did send a Messenger [Musa (Moses)] to Fir'aun (Pharaoh).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger as a witness over you, just as We sent a Messenger to Pharaoh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We have sent to you a messenger, a witness over you, as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger as a witness upon you just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [73:15] We have indeed sent to you, O people of Mecca, a Messenger, namely, Muhammad (s), to be a witness against you, on the Day of Resurrection to any disobedience that you engage in, just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger, namely, Moses, peace be upon him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Lo! We have sent unto you a messenger) i.e. Muhammad (pbuh) (as witness against you) that he has conveyed the message, (even as We sent unto Pharaoh a messenger) i.e. Moses.
